lead_paragraph: Students in Lexington pitched tents on Friday morning for tickets to Saturday’s game. Kentucky, ranked third, lost on a late 3-pointer last year.
snippet: Students in Lexington pitched tents on Friday morning for tickets to Saturday’s game. Kentucky, ranked third, lost on a late 3-pointer last year.

headline.main: Kentucky and Louisville Switch Roles on a Stage of Parochial Passions
headline.seo: Kentucky and Louisville Switch Roles in Yearly Melodrama
headline.print_headline: Kentucky and Louisville Switch Roles on a Stage of Parochial Passions
